content.eq: I(a,b,n) = (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. 1 / (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ n)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting (-n + 1) * (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n) + (-n + 1) * (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n) to (-n + 1) * ((INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n) + (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n))

steps.res: (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n) + (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n)
INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n + sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n

rule.name: Equation
rule.new_expr: INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n + sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n
rule.old_expr: (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n) + (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n)
rule.str: rewriting (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n) + (INT x:[0,pi / 2]. sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n) to INT x:[0,pi / 2]. cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n + sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n

steps.res: INT x:[0,pi / 2]. (sin(x) ^ 2 + cos(x) ^ 2) * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n

rule.name: Equation
rule.old_expr: cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n + sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n
rule.str: rewriting cos(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n + sin(x) ^ 2 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n to (sin(x) ^ 2 + cos(x) ^ 2) * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n

rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite sin(x) ^ 2 + cos(x) ^ 2 to 1 using identity

steps.res: INT x:[0,pi / 2]. 1 / (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ n

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 1 * (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ -n to 1 / (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) ^ n

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 1 / (a * cos(x) ^ 2 + b * sin(x) ^ 2) to (1 / cos(x)) ^ 2 / (a + b * (sin(x) / cos(x)) ^ 2)

rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite sin(x) / cos(x) to tan(x) using identity

rule.name: ApplyIdentity
rule.str: rewrite 1 / cos(x) to sec(x) using identity

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 1 / (b * y ^ 2 + a) to 1 / b / (y ^ 2 + a / b)

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting 2 * sqrt(a) * sqrt(b) to 2 * sqrt(a * b)

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: I(a,b,n) = -1 / (n - 1) * ((D a. I(a,b,n - 1)) + (D b. I(a,b,n - 1)))

steps.res: -(D a. pi / (2 * sqrt(a * b))) - (D b. pi / (2 * sqrt(a * b)))

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: I(a,b,1) = pi / (2 * sqrt(a * b)) on subterms

rule.name: Equation
rule.str: rewriting pi / (4 * a ^ (3/2) * sqrt(b)) + pi / (4 * sqrt(a) * b ^ (3/2)) to pi / (4 * sqrt(a * b)) * (1 / a + 1 / b)

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: I(a,b,n) = -1 / (n - 1) * ((D a. I(a,b,n - 1)) + (D b. I(a,b,n - 1)))

rule.name: ApplyEquation
rule.str: apply equation: I(a,b,2) = pi / (4 * sqrt(a * b)) * (1 / a + 1 / b) on subterms

rule.latex_str: rewriting \(\frac{\pi}{16 a ^ {3/2} \sqrt{b}} (\frac{1}{a} + \frac{1}{b}) + \frac{\pi}{16 \sqrt{a} b ^ {3/2}} (\frac{1}{a} + \frac{1}{b}) + \frac{\pi}{8 a ^ {5/2} \sqrt{b}} + \frac{\pi}{8 \sqrt{a} b ^ {5/2}}\) to \(\frac{\pi}{16 \sqrt{a b}} (\frac{3}{a ^ {2}} + \frac{3}{b ^ {2}} + \frac{2}{a b})\)
rule.name: Equation

rule.latex_str: integrate by parts \(u \to \frac{1}{(x ^ {2} + a ^ {2}) ^ {n}}, v \to x\)
rule.name: IntegrationByParts
rule.str: integrate by parts u -> 1 / (x ^ 2 + a ^ 2) ^ n, v -> x
